name: Pitfall (cattymations)
description:
Fall down a well in this faced paced, leader board based, rouge-like!

Move to score points and don't touch the block or you'll die!

Starting a run

Once your run ends, you can put your name on the leader board! The person with the highest score is put in first place on the learder board. But anyone could get more points and overtake them.

Submitting a score to the leader board Getting quite far in a run

There are also arrows you can fall into for points! They can be a MASSIVE help in getting points. But, they're but in spots that could easily get you killed. So be careful when trying to get more points!

Someone about to collect an arrow
